data.comment: The match has started, with Rotherham kicking-off.
Matt Bloomfield is booked for the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Wycombe.
Wycombe have kicked-off the second half at Adams Park.
The away team have replaced Matt Crooks with Michael Smith. This is the first substitution made today by Paul Warne.
In the minute 66, Ben Wiles is on a sub for Kieran Sadlier for Rotherham.
Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's first substitution at Adams Park with Nick Freeman replacing Matt Bloomfield.
Rotherham's Wes Harding has been booked in Wycombe.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Alex Pattison with Jason McCarthy.
Kyle Vassell is replacing Freddie Ladapo for Rotherham at Adams Park.
Josh Parker is replacing Scott Kashket for the home team.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Michael Ihiekwe heads Rotherham into a 0-1 lead.
